title: Calculate Home Office Deduction
description: A self-employed individual who uses a room in their home exclusively for business wants to claim the home office deduction.

tasks.description: Measure the square footage of the home office and the total square footage of the home.
Choose between the simplified method and the regular method for the deduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent will calculate the deduction both ways to see which is more beneficial.

tasks.description: If using the regular method, gather all indirect (e.g., utilities, insurance) and direct (e.g., repairs) home office expenses and calculate the deduction on Form 8829.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the deduction based on the business use percentage of the home.
